name: Terror? Night
description:
Terror? Night

A short -horror?- game for the Godot Wild Jam #44.

You find yourself playing Eldon Ping, when suddenly something happens to your controller... What's going on?

I've been using Godot for a couple weeks and wanted to create something "larger" to see how it goes. Haven't been able to add everything I wanted to the game, but... that's how jams works! :P

Credits:

MardanGameDev - Developer

DiV4 - FPS Controller Template

Code_Monster - Mesh Batcher

James Frazier - "Comic James" Font

Controls:

  • WASD - Arrow Keys: Move
  • Mouse: Look Around
  • E: Interact
  • Esc: Pause
